name: PixelBot
description:
Pixelbot is a 2D pixel platformer where you have been tasked to destroy game sprites to retrieve the pixels they drop.  Once acquired the pixels give you access to a secret passage. Retrieve all the pixels and find the passage way to the world of color.

Design/Programming - Petipois

Music - Audionautix.com

Controls

Left/Right Arrows - Move

Spacebar - Jump

X - Pixel Rod Attack
